summary: Delachang prompt: "Did you just...did you just flirt with Fleur?"
question: Delachang prompt: "Did you just...did you just flirt with Fleur?"
answer:
(OMG, thanks so much for this prompt! I had so much fun writing these two dorks ❤)

Pairing: Cho/Fleur (Delachang)

Word count: 400

Rating: G

Tags: ice skating, accidental flirting

Read on AO3

~

“Are you alright?”

Cho felt as though her soul was ripped from her very being as she stared up at the helping hand in front of her.

“Yeah, I — I’m okay.” Why couldn’t she have fallen in front of anyone else?! She tried to get back up, but she didn’t know what to do with half her limbs, and so, in a moment of desperation, she reached for the hand before her. Fleur hauled her up with unexpected strength, and Cho somehow managed to steady herself on the skates. “Ice is slippery,” she mumbled, and immediately regretted it. Hadn’t she embarrassed herself enough?!

Fleur just chuckled with that pretty, daring laugh of hers as a grin spread across her face. She was still firmly holding Cho’s hand, as though Cho might fall again if left to her own devices. Truth be told, the contact was making her lightheaded, so it wasn’t exactly helping.

“It is until you get the hang of it,” Fleur said, amused.

“That’s easy to say,” Cho muttered. “I’m afraid we’re not all as graceful as you are.”

“Oh, maybe not everyone, but you certainly are. Believe me, I have seen you on a broom. Those devilish things are impossible to master, and still, you fly with an elegance I could never dream of.”

Cho could have melted the ice under her feet with how warm she suddenly felt inside.

“If you have that much faith in me, perhaps you could teach me to ice skate. I’d teach you a few cool loops in exchange if you want.”

“That’s a lovely idea,” Fleur smiled. “But let me warn you — that is going to take you a long, long time.”

“Well, then I guess it’s a good thing I like spending time with you.”

Fleur’s eyes shone as she let go of Cho’s hand. “We have a deal, then.” She skated backwards a bit and, right before she turned around, she winked. “See you around, darling.”

Cho watched as she skated away feeling giddy and exhilarated.

“Did you just… did you just flirt with Fleur?!”

Cho jumped at Marietta’s voice behind her. The traitor! She had abandoned her to skate a couple of fast, undisturbed rounds — it was her fault she’d fallen in the first place!

“What? No, I didn’t!” Cho blurted. Marietta raised an eyebrow, and she felt herself pale, “Or… oh, Merlin. Did I?!”

(Thanks to @matsinko for betaing!)

blog.name: platform9and3quartrs
blog.title: Wolfstar. Drarry. Must I Go On?
blog.description:
Ella•Hufflepuff with Slytherin tendencies•fangirl af

One day my life will not revolve around fictional characters. Today is not that day

Background by alek-r

summary:
*at the ministry*
Arthur: Oi Lucius, ur a turd
Lucius: How dare you, you poor savage. My son will hear about this!
*meanwhile,...
body:
*at the ministry*

Arthur: Oi Lucius, ur a turd

Lucius: How dare you, you poor savage. My son will hear about this!

*meanwhile, at Hogwarts*

Ron: Malfoy! You suck

Draco: Fuck you weasel, my father will hear about this!

*Malfoy manor over christmas*

Lucius: Draco! You won’t believe what Weasley said!

Draco: Neither will you!

Lucius, holding back tears: That’s my son

tags: harry potter and the deathly hallows
summary: According to Joanne K. Rowling, Snape is the only death eater capable of conjuring a patronus. From the books we learn that this...
body:
According to Joanne K. Rowling, Snape is the only death eater capable of conjuring a patronus. From the books we learn that this is due to his memories of Lily. It is presumable that the other death eaters, Voldemort included, are incapable of remembering a moment of unbridled joy (even if the had such moments in their past). Their anger, bitterness, self loathing and possibly guilt tainted any happy memories they might have drawn on.

In the scene in “Harry Potter and the Deathly Hallows”, where Umbridge interogates muggle-born wizards, it is clearly seen that she has cast a cat patronus that protects her from the Dementors. While wearing the locket that twists the mind and fills it with the darkest thoughts. When consumed, incluenced and surrounded by evil, Umbridge was able to cast a patronus.

According to Rowling she can cast that charm because she thinks she is right. She can find happiness in the thought that every terrible thing she has done will lead to a better world.

tags: i love if i were a...chats
hermes is my favourite greek god
summary:
Draco: If I were a Greek god, I'd be Apollo
Harry: If you were a Greek god, you'd be Hermes, god of  thieves and trickery
Draco:...
body:
Draco: If I were a Greek god, I'd be Apollo
Harry: If you were a Greek god, you'd be Hermes, god of  thieves and trickery
Draco: I'm not a thief!
Harry: You steal my blanket every night!!

blog.name: softboiledwonderland
blog.title:
soft
boiled
wonderland
blog.description:
Tell me, what is it you plan to do
with your one wild and precious life?
—Mary Oliver

summary: ‘Well, I hope he’s up to it,’ said Ron doubtfully. ‘He looks like one good hex would finish him off, doesn’t he?’ ‘D’you think...
body:
‘Well, I hope he’s up to it,’ said Ron doubtfully. ‘He looks like one good hex would finish him off, doesn’t he?’

‘D’you think we should wake him up?’ Ron asked awkwardly, nodding towards Professor Lupin. ‘He looks like he could do with some food.’

‘I suppose he is asleep?’ said Ron quietly, as the witch slid the compartment door closed. ‘I mean – he hasn’t died, has he?’

Ron’s Lupin comments are so funny, how have I never noticed before what an adorable combination of benevolently offensive and caring he is <3

blog.name: accio-shitpost
blog.title: shitpost managed
blog.description:
FAQ

unforgivably cursing you with our existence since 1965

as seen in Bo Burnham's Eighth Grade, apparently

we have a Discord server! join here! (15+ only please)

we track the tag 'accioshitpost' (without a dash) so if you have art or a fic based on of one of our posts, pop it in there and we'll reblog it for you! we always appreciate your creativity!

you can find our amazon wishlists here and here - if you get us anything, we'll post a picture and a thank you note!!

if you want to follow our personal blogs, here's Roxie's, here's Persephone's, and here's Jamie's

nazis, terfs, pedos, and anybody happy to defend or stand by them can leave. we don't want you. avada kedavra, shithead.

now in blue raspberry flavours, hitting stores soon!

summary: voldemort's first death eaters, previously known as the knights of walpurgis. they are among his longest serving and most...
caption:
voldemort’s first death eaters, previously known as the knights of walpurgis. they are among his longest serving and most faithful of followers, though to what degree their loyalty has strengthened/wavered over the years is entirely up to you. however, it’s unlikely that they would have strayed too far from seeing voldemort’s ultimate goal come to light. 

halys is a member-driven au marauders jcink site, set in 1981 at the height of the first wizarding war. we’ve pushed out some timeline updates, and now is the perfect time to join our community & build our AU from the ground up!

→ INDEX | PLOT & CONCEPT | CANON LIST | SUBPLOTS | REQUEST: BEAT THE DEVIL’S TATTOO

blog.name: niceness6of9gemini
blog.title: Hogwarts Mystery: The Cursed Crusaders
blog.description: Damon Isaac McCall Jr.•24 •Spiritual ॐ •Eclectic Witch🌒🌕🌘 •Nature 🌲🌻🍄🌻🌲 •Gemini Rising ♊👾♊️ •Virgo Moon ♍️🌕♍️ • Columbia, MD🌃 •Empath 🔮 •

summary:
Isaac: Sure, now what’s going on?
(Isaac gets up from Slytherin table)
(Isaac sits back down)
Isaac: What did that girl do to...
body:
Isaac: Sure, now what’s going on?

(Isaac gets up from Slytherin table)

(Isaac sits back down)

Isaac: What did that girl do to you? You know Charlie and I are prefects, we could get her disciplined.

Ismelda: It’s not about her, Rose. It’s…Barnaby.

Isaac: You wanna talk to be about it?

Ismelda: It’s complicated.

Isaac: How long have you liked him?

Ismelda: Since third year when Barnaby was still around Merula and me so frequently.

Isaac: Yep, sounds like Merula to me. Look you can count on Penny and I to keep your secret.

Ismelda: Just don’t…get her to tell anyone else.

——————————

Later that afternoon on the school grounds…

——————————

Tonks: Isaac Rose you snot nosed half witted gint! You knew about this the entire time and never figured to let me in on this?!!

Isaac: Penny…you told Tonks…?

Penny: I had to over go tickling torture as she morphed her arms into rooster feathers. Don’t patronize me.

blog.name: bloodtroth
blog.title: for truth, freedom, and love
blog.description:
Anna | Slytherin | 22 |
HP/FB sideblog | JKR POSITIVE

In Grindeldore hell and not planning on leaving anytime soon. I write fanfic, AO3 username: LostMyHeartToHim. I accept prompts. Main: always-shall-be

summary: I remember how some people lost their minds when the mirror trailer was released because it "broke canon" since in book canon...
body:
I remember how some people lost their minds when the mirror trailer was released because it “broke canon” since in book canon Dumbledore saw his family in the mirror and not Grindelwald. But that was only ever speculation on Harry’s part. Very vague speculation that can be taken in multiple ways.

HP&DH, King’s Cross

(Dumbledore has just finished recounting his “friendship” with Grindelwald and how he won the duel)

Harry did not ask whether Dumbledore had ever found out who struck Ariana dead. He did not want to know, and even less did he want Dumbledore to have to tell him. At last, he knew what Dumbledore would have seen when he looked in the Mirror of Erised, and why Dumbledore had been so understanding of the fascination it held over Harry.

The text never explicitly states what it is that Harry thinks that Dumbledore saw and Dumbledore himself never reveals it either.

Also, it’s interesting how after a long silence Harry follows up with: Grindelwald tried to stop Voldemort from going after the wand. He lied, you know, pretended he had never had it.

So, perhaps Harry knew precisely what Dumbledore had seen after all.
